mapper.select: select a.id as bizAreaId,a.name as bizAreaName from employee_rela_biz_area e LEFT JOIN biz_area a ON a.id = e.biz_area_id where e.employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into employee_rela_biz_area
employee_id,
biz_area_id,
gmt_create,
gmt_modify,
#{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{bizAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
